questionTitle: There are a lot of ________ beaches on the South Pacific islands.
Cecilia: I feel another dizzy spell coming on. Margery: I do wish ________ get round to seeing a doctor.
He had to go to the bank to ________ some money for his holiday.
When we came back from holiday our suitcases were ________ by the Customs Officers.
________ you get to the Red Lion pub you will have to stop and ask for directions.
Your husband is very rude. If I were you, I wouldn't stand ________ it.
My brother had his camera ________ from his car in the office car-park.
The two brothers don't get ________ with each other very well; they're always fighting.
Teresa's father began to lose his ________ when he was in his sixties.
When he spoke over the telephone, his voice was so ________ that I could hardly hear him.
I'll see ________ the cooking tonight.
At what time will you call ________ me?
I can assure you ________ my support.
She wanted to borrow the record from me but she was shy ________ asking.
He is a mechanic and his wife works ________.
My parents moved to California when I was 8. I really didn't want us to move there, but I was a child, I had ________.
If I had been to that meeting, I ________ about it.
Come to see me at five o'clock. I ________ ready with my work by that time.
As pretty as ________ = very pretty.
She was ________ out of 115 applicants for the position of Managing Director.
